wikipedia_page.main: John Garsden Heap (5 January 1857 – 20 April 1931) was an English cricketer active in 1884 who played for Lancashire. He was born in Accrington and died in Blackpool. He appeared in two first-class matches, scoring no runs and held two catches.

response: * John Heap (athlete) (1907–2000), English athlete who competed for Great Britain in the 1928 Summer Olympics
